title: Fire Pit, Ceiling Fans, Sparkling Pool
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'If you are going to live in TEXAS, you might as well do it BIG.', '\xa0 West 18th Lofts in Houston is truly in the heart of it all!', '\xa0 Whether you need a one, two or three-bedroom apartment, you will surely find the right fit from the 18 different floor plans we offer.', '\xa0 \xa0 Location, Location, Location \xa0 Conveniently located just minutes from Uptown and Houston Heights, West 18th Lofts is near fine dining, shopping, entertainment destinations, and major freeways.', 'In that regard, we are minutes away from the Galleria Mall featuring over 400 stores and restaurants.', '\xa0 We are also near Memorial Mall, Mid-town, Uptown, and Downtown.', '\xa0 In addition, the biggest park in Houston, Memorial Park, is about a ten-minute drive from our community.', 'This urban park is one of the biggest in the nation and includes an 18-hole golf course, a running course, plus tennis, softball, croquet, and volleyball facilities.', '\xa0 What We Offer – Luxury Living West 18th Lofts offers luxury amenities including a sparkling swimming pool, state-of-the art swimming pool, a full business center, a private conference room, and much more.', '\xa0 Apartment amenities include gourmet prep kitchen island, granite slab countertops, upgraded Whirlpool appliances, spacious walk-in closets, in-unit washer and dryer, and private balconies and patios.', '\xa0 Our floor plans range in size from 580 to 1403 square feet, and of course include loft style home designs.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Gourmet Prep Kitchen Island', 'Billiard Table and Foosball Table', 'Fully Equipped Athletic Center with Cardio Theater, Free Weights, Individual Weight Machines and Spin Room', 'Garden Tubs', 'Upgraded Whirlpool Appliances', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Built-in Desk', 'Sparkling Pool', 'Granite Slab Countertops', 'Daily Spin Class', 'Extra Storage', 'Copy and Fax Services', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
